name: thenable-generator
description: Create generators implemented the PromiseLike interface so that they can be awaited in async contexts.

scripts.prepublishOnly: tsc --module commonjs --target es2015 --sourceMap true --declaration true --noImplicitThis true --noImplicitAny true index.ts
scripts.postpublish: ls index.* | grep -v index.ts | xargs rm -f
scripts.posttest: rm -f test/index.js* && ls index.js* | xargs rm -f

author: A-yon Lee <the@ayon.li>
